node.prompt: Ah, excellent! They're arrived! Try not to feel too bad about your inevitable demise criminal!
The comms link emits a series of high pitched whines and whirrs. F.R.I.E.N.D's face distorts alarmingly
It... It appears I've been... tampered with... Are those... dog ears??
I guess... you have control over your ship... kill the imperial scum... join the rebellion? This is a strange experience...
I should warn you, Striker ships have shields just like your ship. You're going to have to lay down some sustained fire. ... Friend out?
